headline: Willis appoints Dom Spinelli Head of Transactional Insurance Claims in North America
summary: NEW YORK, April 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Willis, a WTW business (Nasdaq: WTW), today announced the appointment of Dom Spinelli as Head of Transactional Insurance Claims for North America. In this role, he will lead the claims function within Willis’ Alternative Asset Insurance Solutions (AAIS) industry vertical division, overseeing the entire lifecycle of transactional insurance claims, including representations and warranties, tax, and contingent matters. headline: WTW unveils next phase in rollout of its Neuron digital trading platform
summary: Liberty Specialty Markets to use Neuron to undertake live trading of D&O and Cyber risks.LONDON, April 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- WTW (NASDAQ: WTW), a leading global advisory, broking, and solutions company, has today announced that Liberty Specialty Markets (LSM) is now using Neuron, WTW’s digital trading solution, to undertake live trading of Directors & Officers (D&O) and Cyber risks. LSM capacity became available on Neuron on 31 March 2025. While initially accessible across two open market
